bucketName.description: A name for the associated Amazon S3 bucket.

bucketPrefix.description: The object key for the destination bucket in which Amazon AppFlow places the files.

privateLinkServiceName.description: The SAPOData Private Link service name to be used for private data transfers.

region.description: AWS Region of the Snowflake account.

stage.description: Name of the Amazon S3 stage that was created while setting up an Amazon S3 stage in the Snowflake account. This is written in the following format: `<Database>.<Schema>.<Stage Name>`.

warehouse.description: The name of the Snowflake warehouse.
